---
title: "Maftools exercise"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
if (!require("BiocManager"))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("maftools")
library(maftools)

# view available TCGA cohorts, check that LGG is there
tcgaAvailable()

# load the available LGG cohort
lgg <- tcgaLoad(study = "LGG")

# view a summary of this file containing LGG sample's somatic variants
lgg

```
```{r}
# oncoplot of the top five mutated genes
vc_cols = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(n = 10, name = 'Paired')

oncoplot(maf = lgg, colors = vc_cols, top = 5)
```

```{r}
# boxplot of the transistion-to-transversion ratio
lgg.titv = titv(maf = lgg, plot = FALSE, useSyn = TRUE)
plotTiTv(res = lgg.titv)
```

```{r}
# plot comparing the mutation load in this LGG cohort to other TCGA cohorts using log scale.
lag.mutload = tcgaCompare(maf = lgg, cohortName = 'LGG', logscale = TRUE, capture_size = 50)

```
